fields.name: Ticketing:
fields.value: At the evening phase, before and after voting, (before results) learn who everyones response is, you then may reduce someones score by 7%. You may let this player be notified of this action (informing them they were ticketed) and your score or not. They will also be roleblocked tonight regardless.

fields.name: Corrupt Cash (Passive):
fields.value: Gain all the score you reduce from someone else in a pool which can give to boost anyones score anytime
